website_summaries.verdict: While you won't get to pick your colors, this option is great for when you want to double your snowball output.
pros: Each makes 2 snowballs at a time
Easy to use, with a comfortable grip
Snowballs are about the size of baseballs
Also good for sand balls and bath bombs
cons: Colors are randomized, so you can't pick and choose what you want
This option sometimes only makes one usable snowball at a time

customer_reviews.title: Quick Snow Balls
customer_reviews.text: My family had a lot of fun with this product. I didn't give it 5 stars because the second snowball (closest to the handle) doesn't mold as well as the first, and turns out smaller, but it was still useful for snowball fights.
customer_reviews.author: BeeGee

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: It’s not horrible but half the time it only makes one snowball at a time and the other one does not work. So better off saving a few dollars and just get the one that makes one snowball at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Handle with care, does not take a drop well...
customer_reviews.text: These make nice sized snowballs but you have to get enough snow in it to be firm. My youngest, 2 can’t get enough and my oldest 5 broke his at the joint by dropping it on the deck within 10 minutes of use. If an older kid or adult is using it, it will be fine but kids will likely break them in a season or 2
customer_reviews.author: MKpies

customer_reviews.title: Snow ball fight!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for a snow ball fight where you get 2 of there, you can only make one snow ball, the other one just doesn’t work
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: They work but are cheaply made which I was expecting my son is rough with everything and one broke immediately
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth l

customer_reviews.title: Snow joke! These are a ball!
customer_reviews.text: So perfect! Snow packing, pack a punch, snowballs hold their shape flying through the air, throw confidently! Sturdy snowball makers took the brunt of 15 kids in one weekend - still in one piece!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Harris

customer_reviews.title: Yay!
customer_reviews.text: SO much fun - works really well - for all ages for kids from 2 to 62!
customer_reviews.author: Louisiana Gal

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Not as easy as I had hoped to make snowballs (it was for little kids) but it did what it was suppose to do. Came sooner that said, which was wonderful because the snow wasn’t going to last very long
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! My son and I are having so much fun
customer_reviews.author: Tree Girl

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy snowball makers
customer_reviews.text: Excellent high quality plastic snowball makers. Easy to use and fun for my kids and as an adult. Happy with the quality and overall ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved them
customer_reviews.text: My girls loved the snow balls fight with these, super cool.
customer_reviews.author: RKA

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun to play with, but one broke on day 3.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We loved making perfectly round snow balls with these! Super fun!!!
customer_reviews.author: E.Cordova

customer_reviews.title: Fun and
customer_reviews.text: Just wish there was more snow when we used them! Fun and easy
customer_reviews.author: Lia N.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use...
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loved them. Makes a perfect snowball and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: thesmilingpirate

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: These are super fun for making a lot of snowballs quickly!
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Great for snow days
customer_reviews.text: We got 6 inches of snow after Christmas and my 5 and 8 year olds got busy making a bunch of snowballs. They spent an hour making them and we had a epic fight later on. They were able to turn light/fluffy snow into good snowballs. I can imagine a heavy snow would be really easy to compact.
customer_reviews.author: Strange design

product_meta.title: CWLAKON Two Snowball Makers,Perfect Outdoor Play Snow Toys for Kids,Two Balls Let You Make Snowballs Quickly(Random 2 Colors)
feature_bullets: QUICK MAKER -Build 2 perfect snowballs in seconds with this simple, effective design.
EASYGRABBING HANDLE- The snowball maker comfortable grip great for every age.
ESSENTIAL FOR SNOW PLAY- This set of snowball maker provides all you need for a fun day in the snow.
MATERIAL-Use thickening PP, The snowball maker is freeze resistant, wear-resisting, no peculiar smell, no burr, do not hurt hand.
